website_summaries.verdict: Gives a lot of performance for not a lot of money. Will give you the same warmth as models costing several times as much.
pros: can be moved from room to room
cons: Some owners complain about fan noise

customer_reviews.title: Good Design and Controls but Required 3 Construction Corrections
customer_reviews.text: Overall OK cosmetic design and easy to move about. Good low center of gravity. Good variable controls for heat output and screen brightness. Some fair materials: cabinet, controls and heater unit. Some cheap materials: doors, heat shield, flame generator. Required these repairs: - Opened bulb hatch to straighten aluminum rotisserie (generates the flames) whose reflective paddles struck cabinet rear wall. - Unscrewed cabinet top to straighten bent cabinet sheet metal top lip. - Unscrewed cabinet bottom's heat shield that vibrated as the heat unit engaged to adhere 2 quieting aluminum tape layers.
customer_reviews.author: A Careful DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Great foot warmer and sets a good ambience
customer_reviews.text: We moved into our house and really enjoyed it except we missed our fireplace. We purchased this electric fireplace, received it in great condition and my husband had the legs on it in about 15 minutes, plugged it in and had a glowing “fire” in seconds. It produces good heat from the bottom of the unit and keeps our feet warm! I recommend it as you can also put items on top of this unit (like a diffuser for your oils) without the top getting hot.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quick Assembly, Easy to Use & Arrived days ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. You just need a phillips screwdriver to install the legs. It is super easy to use, you just plug into the wall. The controls are on the front of the unit, just inside the doors. The doors just pull open, I think they're on a magnet. There is an on/off switch and a dial for temp control and a dial for "flame" control. There was a slight odor when I first turned it on, but that only lasted a couple minutes. The shipping/delivery was great, I was really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia O.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little heater and it looks like a fireplace. I just moved into a new house and I have a "sun room" that is freezing all the time. I bought this to warm it up in there and it's doing a great job.
customer_reviews.author: B.Habel

customer_reviews.title: This helped to maintain our great room at a much warmer temperature vice constantly turning ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for 7 months now and it erally works well. We have two floors and during the winter months the bottom floor really chills down. This helped to maintain our great room at a much warmer temperature vice constantly turning up the heat. It is cute and small, about the size of an end table. In fact I switched this out with one of our end tables for the winter and it looked great!
customer_reviews.author: APV1022

customer_reviews.title: Very easy. Yes
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a portable heater for our sunroom, and found this one. We wanted something small, and white to fit in with our decor. Shipping was prompt, only assembly needed was to attach the legs. Very easy. Yes, some parts are plastic, but when you look at it this is not noticeable. Plug it in and you are good to go. The heat is great, and the "flames" are actually very realistic. Very cute. The heat comes out of the box at the bottom, sides and top remain cool. We are quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V. Laye

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome electric fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for ourselves and loved it so much I bought another as a gift for my sister. She thought this little fireplace was greatest thing since sliced bread, as they say. Attractive, lightweight, puts out nice heat if you want it. Even the dogs like to lay in front of it. We also loved the fact that it is made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: First impressions
customer_reviews.text: Seeing up the unit was easy. Removing the shrink wrap around the to of the unit was a challenge. I couldn't get all of it off and it left lots of discoloration. The top is porous plastic so I'm afraid to try and scratch it off. It makes the unit look ugly and cheep. I'll add more about the heat output if I decide to use it or return it.
customer_reviews.author: The Silverhams

customer_reviews.title: Warm and attractive stove.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the stove, the flame quit working after 10 minutes. There were no instructions in the box at all. I did text to receive instructions and found that bulb had been loosened during shipping. Now works perfectly. I do think it would be helpful to include just basic information in the package. I am sure some purchasing the stove would not be able to text.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like using this to keep the downstairs in our house warm. It supplies enough heat to make it comfortable. I would say the only negative about this heater is that every once in a while it is a little noisy but it usually stops after a few minutes. I have a 1 yo and she has not been hurt by this heater being hot since they designed it to have the heat coming from the bottom which is a HUGE plus!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Great heat source, and looks even better!
customer_reviews.text: This heater is great! We added on an 8 x 10 mudroom and needed some form of heat, this is perfect. It looks so cute in the room, and we have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was fast and it arrived in good shape, one little hole in outer box
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and it arrived in good shape, one little hole in outer box, but the inside box and excellent packing kept the stove safe. The stove is strongly made and is attractive, I wish it had arrived with it's legs connected. I would have paid extra for that. I wish it had a control for a steady low heat. I can understand the cool air happening on the higher temps for safety. I am adjusting to the changes from the other small stove heaters I have purchased in past years. I do like the safety measures and would buy it again..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap to keep and a very realistic flame.
customer_reviews.text: We run it daily in our living room and it does the trick. Solid construction and easy assembly ... just screw on he legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I Love my new electric fireplace. It heats up my small living room so nicely. It makes the room so cozy. I do however wish the flames would be higher. I had watched a video someone posted a few years back. The flames were different and I liked the look of the older model flames. I wish they hadn’t changed them in the newer model. But overall I so love this fireplace stove. Definitely worth the money. So many compliments on it from family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: It worked ok...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to put out pretty good heat. The box was not damaged, although the leg was cracked. We went ahead and set it up anyways but going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dentalnut62

customer_reviews.title: Heater does the job
customer_reviews.text: I picked this because I not only needed a space heater but because it is really great looking. I am in my basement a lot and my hands get to freezing and very hard to play guitar. This heater does a great job and am very happy with my purchase. It came double boxed and packed really well. The operation is simple. My space was at 64 degrees and in about 25 minutes I was enjoying nice 68 degrees. Thank you for making great space heater.
customer_reviews.author: barricwiley

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Adorable in my little living room. Heat is decent, if we are sitting in the living room it’s perfect so I don’t have to turn the heater on and heat the entire house. It is very cute. I love that I can easily move it if needed. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a bit more heat than I expected and looks better than I expected. Have had only a short time, so can't speak to durability. Packaging was very protective. Instruction require internet to access, but assembly and operation are intuitive
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: What a gem! Heats very well for its size and is as cute and cozy as a bug in a rug! Came very well packaged and was easy to put the legs on (all the "putting together" you need to do). The black part of the doors are made of pretty weak feeling plastic which is the only reason I gave this 4 stars...but I'd buy it again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great looking addition to the room
customer_reviews.text: I set this heater up in front of the fireplace for days when I don't want to be loading fire wood. It's a great looking addition to the room, and it adds just enough supplementary heat on the really cold days. I keep it on low, and it warms the room quite nicely. Its sturdy and very cozy looking. Love that I can also just turn on the flames without the heater running. It was well packaged and arrived early. Really glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: It can heat a small room
customer_reviews.text: I received the unit and only had to install the legs which was very easy. When I tried to open the doors the handles broke. I called the company and replacement handles were sent however these handles were larger than the original holes and would not work. I had to get handles from hardware store that would normally be used on furniture
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product 👍
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in front of fireplace, the plastic protective wrapping was very hard to take off though. Heats our living room in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking fire place at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great looking fire place at a reasonable price! AND, able to change the lightbulbs that produce the flame effect! Came quickly, well packed and easy to put together. I have it in my living-kitchen, with the TV, Apple TV and Rku sitting on the top! Convenient, attractive ad great size.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat the area that says heat
customer_reviews.text: Hello, the fireplace does not heat the total area that says, I live in cold weather in Colombia but it does not go down to 14 degrees and still does not heat well, you have to be completely next to get warm ... I'm disengaged and I I would like to return it, however I do not know how it could be from Colombia. I hope you can help me.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA CECILIA CALLE

customer_reviews.title: Love our little heaters
customer_reviews.text: Love our little heaters, been using in the living room to take out the chill so I don’t need to turn on the house heater. Works great and looks like a real fire.
customer_reviews.author: Joy kagle

customer_reviews.title: Cute n reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have Lived this stove and have had years of use at this point. I only wish it had tip over protection. Other then that ONE issue I would would highly recommend this darling and dependable heater!
customer_reviews.author: BETH P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice!. It is well made and looks pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice!. It is well made and looks pretty much like a real wood stove. The legs screw on easily, that being the only assembly required.. The controls are easy to use, with variable flame and temp. It runs quietly and heats up the room in no time. It has an authentic vibe to it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SteveCee23

customer_reviews.title: functionally great. poor quality
customer_reviews.text: cane with a huge crack in the side. really disappointing. works great and would be too much of a beast to attempt to re-package for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Grose

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item..!! Keeps our front room nice and toasty also gives the affect of a real fire makes those cold night, nice and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: SarinaStar

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heater
customer_reviews.text: Well, after much thought, I purchased this. it actually has exceeded my expectations. Makes my apartment feel like a cabin and makes up for weak steam heat in the building. I got the red one fist, but exchanged for black, it looks more real in black for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul WATERS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty unit to heat a tiny space.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking unit because of the designs and the flames. However do not buy it if you need to heat a space bigger than about 3 feet by 3 feet, as it simply lacks the heating unit to do that. I am keeping the unit, because its nice looking, but bought another more powerful space heater for a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Klausmeyer

customer_reviews.title: buzz
customer_reviews.text: awesome flame that looks very realistic for an electric unit! The fireplace could definitely be improved with the heater unit. I ordered 2 units and both had an annoying loud buzz sound for a few seconds when the heating element kicks in... Temporary buzz is in addition to the normal heater sound. I would have rated 5 stars if it weren't for this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: This stove sits in a glassed in deck that is furinished in white wicker. It matches perfectly. Not only does it give off heat it adds a touch of class. It is very easy to use and is quite efficient. We are very pleased with the product and happy we ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: ATH

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little heater to warm up my reading room. I wish the legs were wood, not plastic, and the heater not black since my room is decorated in white, but overall this was the perfect heater form my room. Plug and play! Looks good and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great and puts out a lot of heat. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I have a real fireplace in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I got a white noise machine with a fireplace setting to go with it, and it honestly feels like a real fire is going... very cozy to fall asleep to!
customer_reviews.author: kerin colpean

customer_reviews.title: Warm and toasty
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble, my 11 year old granddaughter did it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heater!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and reading a lot of reviews trying to find just the right fireplace space heater. I'm very pleased with this one. I bought two. The flames are beautiful and the glow of the embers is realistic. The blower is forceful and heats the area very well! I'd recommend this heater. The sound of the blower is normal, just as any space heater.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stove! Alohaaaaa!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stove! Don’t need the heat too much in Hawaii but will use in the winter when it gets into the blistery 60s!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sink

customer_reviews.title: exaclty what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the heater. We love it. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & lots of heat
customer_reviews.text: Super cute & lots of heat!! Just what we needed. Wanted to purchase a second one, but price increased lots.??
customer_reviews.author: Bradcath

customer_reviews.title: love this stove
customer_reviews.text: other than not having remote control, this is a perfect substitute for my fireplace
customer_reviews.author: Hellcat13

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived exactly as described. It was a gift for my mother and she loves it. She said it is not only beautiful but works great as well. She is also able to move it easily by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Danette Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Heater!
customer_reviews.text: This heater is exactly what I was looking for. It puts out a good amount of heat, looks very authentic and is super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: debbie f.

customer_reviews.title: Great little electric fire effect heater
customer_reviews.text: Great little electric fire effect heater. Works prefectly for the den, or library that needs a fireplace. We are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Ray

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: We received this item and plugged it in and NO flames. It had heat, but no flames. Very disappointed. Sending it back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pettner

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This little heater not only looks good, but does a great job heating a fairly large room in a very old house. It fits just right inside what's now just a decorative fireplace. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Color description  ex shade or tone of red title Beautiful fireplace
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect .very pretty and fits the space for it under an antique mantel works good I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne jongebloed

customer_reviews.title: Heats room well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when it was promised. Four leg assembly was easy. Looks very good. The only issue is when I turn on the lighted part it makes a clicking noise. It may have been damaged during shipping. The roller that makes up the fire look rubs up against something and it makes a noise the whole time it is on. Yes a little irritating. But It heats very well and that is what I really needed was the heater part. Sooo.......
customer_reviews.author: LaJewell F.

customer_reviews.title: Great heat and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, portable and heats my basement family room 12'x20' just perfectly! Putting the legs on was as easy as could be, you just need a Philips screwdriver. For the price this is the best looking and best heating electric fireplace that I have found! I like it that you can adjust the flames independently from the heat. The little doors open and close to hide the electric controls. I have an old house (with old wiring) and was worried, as some of the bigger stoves of this kind will blow fuses. But this one does not! I can have the TV, DVD player and this handy stove going with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Looks great and heats okay. Heater is not as powerful as I expected and the switches are different than pictured, but I think it's a pretty nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: I had another model like this one and the movers broke it
customer_reviews.text: I had another model like this one and the movers broke it. This one looks better and the heat output is great.
customer_reviews.author: John   Simmons

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEATER
customer_reviews.text: GOOD deal fast shipping. Highly recommend. Works as described Amd it is quite. Realistic flames, just make it a plus.
customer_reviews.author: greg saxon

customer_reviews.title: You'll like the realistic flames.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the stove has a thermostat that maintains a steady temperature. I can leave it on 24 hours a day and it will only run the heating elements when the area around it gets chilly. It also has a nice old-fashioned appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great heater
customer_reviews.text: It puts out a lot of heat for a small heater, I'm not complaining but the overall size of the unit was smaller than I expected, but that happens to fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: stephen hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Heats up my life
customer_reviews.text: I bought it used but it still works and works well goody heat output
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this electric Jasper space heater It's quite efficient ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this electric Jasper space heater It's quite efficient operation coupled with the soft glow of the fireplace has been most welcome--it has been running constantly for over three weeks straight!! Visitors marvel at how comfortable our large living area is without the use of our wood stove.Thus far I would certainly recommend it to anyone considering it's purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joesays

customer_reviews.title: A very nice looking unit
customer_reviews.text: A very nice looking unit. The flame is one of the most realistic I have seen. In a very quiet room you can hear a low hum from the fan but it is not disturbing. We have received lots of nice comments on this and two friends took the information so they can buy their own.
customer_reviews.author: Al Lehman

customer_reviews.title: We both love it. It's quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my grandson. We both love it. It's quiet. It's efficient and the company sent me a lovely email thanking me for the purchase, which I thought was very special.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fireplace stove ever!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I love it! We use it all the time. It really puts out heat. If we don't want heat we just turn on the flames.
customer_reviews.author: Brande Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It looked very nice, but broke at the beginning of the second winter. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Garage Door Owner

customer_reviews.title: have really had to use more then 2 times seems to have done the job so far.
customer_reviews.text: Mfg packaging, arrived on schedule. Unit is light weight and is easy to assemble. Only used 2 times but it seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this space heater
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this space heater. Appearance is so inviting and nice heat source for a nice size room. ITS MADE IN THE USA!!!! Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Michele Freeze

customer_reviews.title: ... my expectations in producing heat as well as looking good. i would recommend this to anyone who desires ...
customer_reviews.text: This has by far surpassed my expectations in producing heat as well as looking good.i would recommend this to anyone who desires a heater and looks like a fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Loshark

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Wonderfully cheesy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Wonderfully cheesy and fun. We put it in a basement entertainment rooom and it takes the chill out of the room without heating any surfaces surrounding it. If it lasts a reasonable length of time, it will be the best item we have purchased from Amazon for exceeding expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: low heat output
customer_reviews.text: Low heat output Plug got very hot Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and works well. Start making these with a remote and you will have a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Pulled it out of the box, attached the legs with the screws provided and plugged it in. It warmed up our room within minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pawlik-Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this heater
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this heater. Looks good operates ok.But it does NOT put out the heat the manufacturer claims it should. Outdoor temp 50 degrees it doesn't put out enough heat to heat a12x10 room to 70 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Armand L. St Jean

customer_reviews.title: So far Ii love it, only had it for a few days
customer_reviews.text: So far Ii love it, only had it for a few days, it heats up my bedroom quickly on a cold morning
customer_reviews.author: BEV

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This little electric fireplace is a great buy. It puts out nice heat. It is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It has good amount of heat and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It has good amount of heat and its also pretty quiet when running. I was glad I made purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and keeps me warm
customer_reviews.text: Really please with this purchase. It looks great and keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stove!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with our purchase. 4 star rating only because we think the controls could have been better concealed. The flame and fire bed are very realistic, it is very quiet and heats immediately.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boggess

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet and it really warms the room. The variable flame effect is nice, I like that I can adjust the flame at night etc. Looks good and its not made cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyL

customer_reviews.title: It's all that!
customer_reviews.text: It's all of what's advertised, truly loving it. Plus, e-Flame = A+++, great customer service. If what's advertised is what you're looking for, you won't be disappointed buying this product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Edward P.

customer_reviews.title: So over all I am more then happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Receive said item on time and was very please. The unit works very well. The lighting effects look so real, that ones would think that there is a real fire going. The heating for both low and hi works with know problems. The thermostat settings kick on and off when set. So over all I am more then happy with this product. The most important thing was the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: HAWK1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quickly warms up a small room.. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Yensid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and realistic flame! Puts out good heat and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like real cast iron from distance. Top does stay cool. Throws nice heat and gives cozy look.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Holton

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to move where you need it
customer_reviews.text: Really heats up the room. And you can put on low or high depending on the size of the room. Attractive and easy to move where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it. It does not heat my garage like i hoped it would
customer_reviews.author: Penni Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and a good source of heat
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Very attractive and a good source of heat!
customer_reviews.author: John Michael Pelet

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed. For as nice looking as this "stove" is
customer_reviews.text: The Jasper Electric Fireplace Heater is a dysfunctional product. I have returned 2 of them. The heat stopped working on the first heater after only 4 days. The fan and heater stopped working after 5 days of operation on the second one.. I am so disappointed. For as nice looking as this "stove" is, what a disappointment in performance. If you are looking for a simulated electric fireplace heater, pick a different product other than the Jasper.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Bell Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Rattles All the Time
customer_reviews.text: This looks like but rattles loudly on start-up. I've tried tightening every screw on the bottom by the heater but it still rattles loudly. Sometimes you can get it to stop by banging on it but that's not a good solution. I've contacted Amazon and hopefully they can assist. Very disappointing especially for how much it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in living room
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in living room, Especially in low light. The flickering flames effect not bad. Makes the home feel a lot warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best space heaters I have owned
customer_reviews.text: One of the best space heaters I have owned. We use it to heat a 200 foot addition for our house. We bought this product and it worked great for the first month, then it had a malfunction causing the heater portion not to work any longer. I emailed to company about the problem and within 24 hours they had a new one sent to our house. Very professional company.
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this fireplace!! Does a great job heating up my apartment and looks really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hamelin

customer_reviews.title: I love this fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this electric fireplace! It is adorable, east to assemble (just screw 4 legs on), and warms up my place perfectly. It creates ambiance that is perfect for any time of the day. It is a great addition to my furnace, which doesn't have to run as much when I have the fireplace on. I will most likely purchase another one for my upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Simard

customer_reviews.title: Great until noise started on day 3
customer_reviews.text: Very cool device, however, on day 3 of moderate use the rotating mechanism started making an annoying noise. Thankfully, not a loud one. Previously, it was a very quiet heater. Oh, and check the bulbs when you get them. One of mine had a broken filament. Would have given 5 stars if not for the new noise after 3 days. Hopefully, the unit will stop breaking. Otherwise, a very effective heater.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This electric fireplace was horrible when it arrived. The log inside the glass was angled that it looked like a see-saw. Since I didn't want to go thru the pain of return and all that, I just fixed it myself. I found out that the log inside wasn't screwed so when you move it, the log moves. It was obviously poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: reyr

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control. I love everything about the stove except it is loud and clicks . I am returning it. Contacted the manufacture but have not heard back.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: I was really excited to order this after all of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to order this after all of the positive reviews-the heater I recieved had no legs included, and the wood display had come dislodged from the prongs behind the glass. E-flame has no customer service phone number to call, so I'll be sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and classic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and compact, this little heater brings warmth and comfort with ease. The fan is quiet and the flames are very realistic. My only complaint was the interior of the fireplace doors are very easily distinguished as plastic. Other than that, I'm in love!!
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Gorgeous

customer_reviews.title: Good Order
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (legs only) and it was as expected. We've used two nights and it seems to provide the amount of heat that we wanted and expected. Nothing fancy ... but it's very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Gardner

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product to facilitate heat in master bedroom ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to facilitate heat in master bedroom as advertised to heat large rooms. Heater running all day and bedroom is still cold. Puts out very little heat beyond a couple feet radius of heater. the product was returned.
customer_reviews.author: BILL R.

customer_reviews.title: I dont think its made well.
customer_reviews.text: I dont use this everyday, but it just stopped working. I tried everything, it just shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Celia DeCandia

customer_reviews.title: test immediately for proper working order
customer_reviews.text: Well, unfornately, I did not test this product when it arrived and now it is beyond the point of return. The heater does not work on the High setting. The fuse trips and the unit shuts off. It is of no value to me. It's pretty but does not work.
customer_reviews.author: STP625

customer_reviews.title: Great looking stove
customer_reviews.text: Great looking stove. The problem is that when the flame feature is on, the stove "TH-THUNKS" every 3.5 seconds. SUPER annoying to have in the piano room, it makes a lousy metronome when I'm trying to play! Unfortunately, I did not turn the stove on until it was cold enough to, and therefore did not discover the problem until after it was too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do much in less u standing right next to ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do much in less u standing right next to it , wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Bennie Winfield

product_meta.title: e-Flame USA Jasper Freestanding Electric Fireplace Stove - 3-D Log and Fire Effect (Black)
feature_bullets: DESIGN | The classic design highlights the realistic wood burning effect and dancing flames. This hearth is lightweight, and stays cool-to-the-touch. Transporting from room-to-room is easy. This is a fashionable heating solution for any space. Perfect for your guest room, basement, garage, apartment, office, or motorhome/RV. Safe to set on all flooring types.

FEATURES | A quiet, fan-forced heater has a thermostat and easy-to-adjust settings for even heat distribution. Enjoy the warm glow of the flames all year with the no-heat. Safety protection includes automatic shut-off to prevent overheating. Unit is odorless and smokeless. Safe for the elderly, kids, and pets.

DECORATION | Dress your firebox up to reflect your personal style. All exterior faces stay cool, so it is a great way to display your seasonal décor and home accessories. The Jasper comes with charming opening double glass doors.

ENERGY SAVINGS | This unit can reduce your electric bill by using over 90% less energy than gas. It heats up quickly, and has two heat setting options so there is no need to pay the high cost of heating your entire home.

SPECIFICATIONS | Replaceable 40-watt bulb. This 1500-watt unit comes with a 6-ft. long cord which plugs into any standard household outlet. Provides supplemental heat for up to 400 sq. ft. Sturdy and double opening glass doors. 5115 BTUs. Quick and easy assembly will get you warm and comfortable in minutes. 25" (H) x 23.6" (W) x 11.2".
